# BioGA

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The `BioGA` package provides a set of functions for genetic algorithm optimization tailored for analyzing high throughput genomic data. These functions are implemented in C++ for improved speed and efficiency, with a convenient interface for use within R.

## Installation

You can install the package directly from GitHub using the `devtools` package:

```{r}
devtools::install_github("danymukesha/BioGA")
```
